name: Emilio Delgado
bio: AI researcher at the University of Extremadura focusing on multi-agent systems and Deep Learning. I work at the intersection of AI and software engineering, exploring how intelligent agents can improve collaboration, decision-making, and efficiency across the development lifecycle. I also pursue applied research in healthcare, using robust and interpretable deep learning to unlock insights from clinical data and medical imaging while respecting privacy and ethics.
